title: Strengthening Business Practical Competencies: Mental Models for Overcoming Challenges in Learning Management Information Systems

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational concepts in business administration and intermediate or advanced understanding of information systems
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners can visually construct a mental model of key concepts in management information systems and clearly explain the knowledge structure
Learners can analyze and compare real-world business cases of information systems using cognitive maps
Based on peer feedback, learners can revise and refine their mental models to diagnose learning gaps
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
